message: We are holding another sprint at Cartwheel HQ on Sunday, April 10. We'll be able to host 22 people but hope we get remote contributors.
Hey @natea, could you make it on April 10?
I wish I could come that weekend, but I'll still be in Boston attending BarCampBoston. I'm planning to come out the following weekend Apr. 15-17. Might you be sprinting then?
@pydanny The dates are confirmed. I'll be out in LA Apr. 13-17. Hope to see you guys while I'm out there!
Which is your weekend...
@natea We definitely need to meet up. Where will you be? Also, while we have the Cartwheel sprint the week before, there is something in the works that may mean an event the following weekend.
I can do the afternoon of the 10th, remote. (about 1 or 1:30 CST)
Just thought I would toss this in: http://pydanny.blogspot.com/2011/04/pycon-2011-sprint-report.html

for postgres on the mac, add this to /etc/sysctl.conf:
kern.sysv.shmmax=8388608
kern.sysv.shmmin=1
kern.sysv.shmmni=64
kern.sysv.shmseg=8
kern.sysv.shmall=32768
